name: @hail2u/ellipsis-title
description: Put `title` attribute to elements that have `text-overflow: ellipsis`
author: Kyo Nagashima <hail2u@gmail.com> (https://hail2u.net/)

scripts.build: cp src/ellipsis-title.js dist/ellipsis-title.js && cd dist/ && uglifyjs --output ellipsis-title.min.js --source-map ellipsis-title.min.js.map ellipsis-title.js
